scripts.dev: bun --bun concurrently -c -n api-gateway,api-auth,api-main "cd services/api-gateway && bun run dev" "cd services/api-auth && bun run dev" "cd services/api-main && bun run dev"
scripts.lint: bun --bun concurrently -c -n api-gateway,api-auth,api-main "cd services/api-gateway && bun run lint" "cd services/api-auth && bun run lint" "cd services/api-main && bun run lint"
scripts.build:bin: bun --bun concurrently -c -n api-gateway,api-auth,api-main "cd services/api-gateway && bun run build:bin" "cd services/api-auth && bun run build:bin" "cd services/api-main && bun run build:bin"
scripts.build:openapi: mkdir -p dist/openapi-doc && ./node_modules/.bin/redocly build-docs docs/OpenAPI/link-d-law.json --config infrastructures/redoc/redocly.yaml -o dist/openapi-doc/index.html
scripts.db:prepare: bunx prisma format && bunx prisma generate
scripts.db:migrate:dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- bunx prisma migrate dev && bunx db:prepare
